about_the_game:
This is a 3D resource pack of trees, plants and flowers that are essential for outdoor landscapes.
Each of the stamps of various trees, from those standing straight up to those with crooked trunks, is available in a variety of leaf colors.
In addition, flowers of all shapes and sizes and the surrounding grasses are also available.

The legendary tree that stands in the schoolyard, in the forest where secrets sleep, in the suburban woods, in the street trees, in the flowers in the garden beds.
Add some color to your world with the Forest Pack!

[Forest Pack - Contents]
-- 3D Stamps: 135
Trees: 70 (14 types - 4 variations each)
Grass and Flowers: 55 (Flowers: 42 types + 2 variations, Grass: 1 type 11 variations)
Others: 9 (Butterfly: 1 type 7 variations, Water Surface: 2 types)

Sample Map: 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.

short_description: This is a 3D resource pack of trees, plants and flowers that are essential for outdoor landscapes. It includes a variety of trees, from straight standing trees to those with crooked trunks, as well as a variety of plants and flowers, and can create a variety of landscapes.
